titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION and ORDER to Continue the Trial Date and Corresponding Dates set forth in the Court's Pretrial Order: Motions in Limine are due 9/22/2014, Oppositions due by 10/7/2014, Replies due by 10/13/2014, Motion in Limine/Trial Confirmation Hearing set for 10/27/2014 at 10:00 AM in Courtroom 2 (AWI) before District Judge Anthony W. Ishii, Jury Trial is now set for set for 11/12/2014 at 08:30 AM in Courtroom 2 (AWI) before District Judge Anthony W. Ishii, signed by District Judge Anthony W. Ishii on 4/7/2014. (Kusamura, W)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Rodriguez
titleInfo.subTitle: STIPULATION to Continue Scheduling Dates Consistent With New trial Date; ORDER THEREON as to Ramon Alexander Rodriguez, signed by District Judge Anthony W. Ishii on 10/7/2014. (Motions in Limine to be filed by 12/8/2014, Oppositions due by 12/22/2014, Replies due by 12/29/2014; proposed jury instructions be filed and served by 1/6/2015; witness lists, trial briefs, exhibits, proposed voir dire, and matters related to use of videotapes, CDs, computers, and other audio/visual equipment be served and filed by 1/22/2015; the parties to meet and confer before the jury instruction hearing and trial confirmation hearing date on 1/12/2015.) (Gaumnitz, R)

extension.courtName: United States District Court Eastern District of California

(Gaumnitz, R)
